alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 12:45AM CST until March 03 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Grant County in central Arkansas... Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 1244 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Prattsville to near Carthage to 7 miles northwest of Louann, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Camden... Sheridan... Fordyce... Rison... Hampton... White Hall... Redfield... Bearden... Leola... Calion... Kingsland... Thornton... Carthage... Prattsville... Harrell... Louann... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Hampton Municipal Airport... Moro Bay... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Ouachita
